article_title: Hospital financially sound as health industry changes

article_metadata.description: This is the first in a two-part series. The second part will appear in the Wednesday edition. HILLSDALE — As it celebrates its 100th year of services to Hillsdale and the surrounding region, Hillsdale Community Health Center is holding its own in a rapidly changing health care industry.With an unrestricted fund balance of over $25 million, HCHC has funds to operate for about 125 days without revenues. That is one of the measures hospitals use to evaluate financial stability. Many
article_metadata.author: Don Reid dwreid@aol.com; @DReidTDR
